CustomField.description: Grouping field for Vertical to make stacked bar chart more readable. Buckets didn't work on chart due to SFDC issue. Exec Overview DB - marking it as ZZ as we'll no longer use it
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Food -"), "Food", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Fulfillment"), "Fulfillment", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Mfg -"), "Manufacturing", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Office Like"), "Office", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Government"), "Government", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Ent and Hosp"), "Other", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Graphic"), "Print", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Printer - "), "Print", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Pub - "), "Publishing", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Re-D"), "Re-D", IF(CONTAINS(Text(Account_Vertical__c), "Redistribution"), "Re-D", "Other" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: zzVertical Group
